channel.title: Wizards 101
channel.description: just kind of curious are there any wizards 101 private servers? 0.o never played the actual game no idea if its multi player or not...saw a commercial for it but it seems pretty expensive so figured would try a server if there are any xD

item.title: Wizards 101
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:14, topic:433663”][quote author=Daginith link=topic=536382.msg3924107#msg3924107 date=1330029894]

[quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=536382.msg3924103#msg3924103 date=1330029787]

[quote author=Daginith link=topic=536382.msg3924101#msg3924101 date=1330029682]

I’m sure it’s possible lol, I’ve never actually looked into the game as it seems like something my 9 year old sister would play.
[/quote]erm… uh…yeah it’s mostly little kiddies was talking to a 4 year old apparently yesterday > > told him I was 23 he was like "how you not better player " (his older brother had to type for him )

Y U NO THE BEST?
[/quote]because I played for an hour, got to level 7, then quit?

haha, ive never played it. Is it that bad?
[/quote]To be totally honest, at first glance it’s a pretty good game. It’s fun at first but maybe it’s just my age but it gets old pretty boring sort of fast to me at least.[/quote]The first area is pretty bad. When you start getting new awesome spells it gets slightly cooler. But you’re right, it is aimed at a much younger age group.

Read full topic

item.title: Wizards 101
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:7, topic:433663”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=536382.msg3922019#msg3922019 date=1329802270]
The free trial actually lasts you quite a while, and you can either do a micro-transaction or a subscription service. To buy the ENTIRE game, and never need a subscription, was like 60 dollars when I played (or 40 for sales). That’s one thing I like about it at least. You can pay as you go, and not worry if you end up quitting, because your not paying by the month.

Last time I played this was right after Celestia came out, not sure what’s changed since then though. I may be completely incorrect. I actually am gunna go take a look.

EDIT - Wow, two whole new worlds. I may take this game back up a bit and have a looksie.
[/quote]yeah I got into the game somewhat yesterday… this one monster did like 200 damage on me[/quote]That’s nothing When I get my buffs on I can do soooo much with fire dragon

Read full topic

yes, but that is just a trial. If I get hooked on the trial then I am screwed.

The free trial actually lasts you quite a while, and you can either do a micro-transaction or a subscription service.
